Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
Rashly \Rash"ly\, adv. In a rash manner; with precipitation. [1913 Webster]
He that doth anything rashly, must do it willingly; for he was free to deliberate or not. --L'Estrange. [1913 Webster]
rashly adv : in a hasty and foolhardy manner; "he fell headlong in love with his cousin" [syn: {headlong}]
